tgt_text: Motlakase.

src_text: Kabinete etse hloko tswelopele entsweng ka ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Tshebetso ya Eneji, ha ntse amohela hore ho na le ditshitiso tse ntseng di le teng kgahlanong le marangrang naha..
tgt_text: Kabinete nopotse kgatelopele e setseng dirilwe mo go tsenyeng tirisong Leano la Naga la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato bile a dumelana gore go santse go le gontsi go go santseng go tlhoka go diriwa mo go baakanyeng diyuniti tsa tlamelo ya motlakase ka fa nageng..

src_text: Ha naha kena nakong ya Mariha, Kabinete amohetse phethelo ya Konteraka bakeng sa di-megawatts tse 400 (MW) tsa bokgoni bo ekeditsweng ka Standard Offer Programme tla ba inthaneteng pele ho mafelo Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Jaaka naga tsena mo marigeng, Kabinete itumedisitswe ke konteraka e sa tswang go garelwa ya dimekawate di le 400 ya go oketsa motlakase ka Letsholo la go Reka Motlakase mo Ditlamong tse di Nang le Motlakase Montsi go Feta di Dirisang mme motlakase ono tla gokelelwa mo diyuniting tsa rona tsa motlakase pele kgwedi ya Motsheganong 2023 konosela..

Mo godimo ga seno, Lefapha la Boitekanelo le nopotse maokelo le 213 a sa tshwanelwang ke go kgorelediwa ke go tshabela ruri ga motlakase, mo go ona le 76 ke ao ntseng sa itemogele matsapa ano mme tiro ya go oketsa palo eno ka maokelo mangwe gape le 46 gatetse pele mo go bonagalang..

src_text: Ho feta moo, Lefapha la Bophelo bo botle le kgethile dipetlele tse 213 hore di se angwe ke ho kgaoha ha motlakase, ho tsona tse 76 di se di ntse di qheletswe ka thoko mme lefapha le sebeletsa hore le eketse dipetlele tse ding tse 46 ha boemo bo se bo hatetse pele..
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe gape le ke thankgololo e solofetsweng ya Lefelo la Ditirelo tse Dintsi tsa Merero ya Motlakase ka la bo 31 Motsheganong 2023 le le tla thankgololwang ke ba Dipeeletso tsa Naga ya Aforika Borwa leng selo se se tla potlakisang dithulaganyo tsa go ikobela melao go tswela thuso ditlamo tse dintšhwa tsa motlakase gore le tsona di kgone go thusa nopotse kgatelopele e setseng dirilwe kwa Seteišeneng sa Motlakase sa Kusile go busetsa tirisong dimekawate di le 3 200 tsa yuniti ya bo 1, 2, 3 le 5 tsa motlakase mo bokhutlhong jwa ngwaga wa..

src_text: Kabinete amohela hape ho thakgolwa ho atametseng ha Energy One-Stop Shop ka la 31 Motsheanong 2023 ke Invest SA ho potlakisa mekgwa ya taolo tla thusa dikhampani tse ntjha tse fehlang matla hore le tsona di nke karolo etse hloko tswelopele entsweng Seteisheneng se Fehlang Matla sa Kusile ho tsosolosa 3 200 MW, yuniting ya 1, 2, 3 le ya 5, ho marangrang naha qetellong ya..
tgt_text: Kabinete santse tlhobaediwa ke dikgang tsa maaka tse di tswelelang go phasaladiwa mo mafaratlhatlheng ditlhaeletsano tse di reng naga tlo welwa ke lefifi la go tlhoka motlakase ka ntlha ya go phutlhama ga diyuniti tsotlhe tsa tlamelo ya motlakase.

src_text: Kabinete tshwenyehile ka tswelopele ya phatlalatso ya ditaba tsa bohata, ho pharalla le metjha ya ditaba ya setjhaba bolelang ka katamelo ya ho putlama ha marangrang naha leng se tla baka ho tima ha motlakase ka ho felletseng.
tgt_text: Eskom netefaleditse puso gore na le maano go tlhokomela diyuniti tseno go dira gore naga se iphitlhele mo seemong sa go welwa ke lefifi.

src_text: Eskom tiiseditse mmuso ka merero keneng tshebetsong bakeng sa ditshireletso tsa tsamaiso ho thibela ho tima ha motlakase ka ho felletseng naheng yohle.
tgt_text: Kabinete santse boeletsa boikuelo jwa yona jwa gore batho botlhe ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa ba tshwanetse go boloka motlakase.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa hape ho batho bohle ba Afrika Borwa hore ba tswele pele ho boloka motlakase.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo ke go boloka motlakase yo kanaka dimekawate di le 1 000 ka letsatsi, mme seno se tla kgona go fokotsa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri ka kgato le nngwe letsatsi le letsatsi.

src_text: Morero ke ho boloka bonyane 1 000 MW ka letsatsi leng se lekanang le ho boloka mohato wa pele wa ho kgaoha ha motlakase letsatsi ka leng.
tgt_text: Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase, Ngaka Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, mo kopanong le bobegakgang ka Labotlhano wa la bo 26 Motsheganong 2023 tla baya naga mo dinakong ka dikgato tse di tserweng mo go tsenyeng tirisong Leano la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato.

src_text: Letona la Motlakase, Ngaka Kgosientsho Ramokgopa tla tsebisa naha ka dintlha tsa moraorao tsa ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Tshebetso ya Eneji ka Labohlano la 26 Motsheanong 2023, puisanong ya boraditaba.
tgt_text: Boitekanelo.

src_text: Bophelo bo Botle.
tgt_text: Go tloga ka la bo 24 Motsheganong 2023 Puso tlhomile Komiti ya Merero ya Setegeniki e eteletsweng pele ke Lefapha la Boitekanelo la Naga, go samagana le bolwetse jwa Kholera jo bo weleng kwa Hammanskraal mo masepaleng wa Teropo ya Tshwane, jo ga jaana bo setseng bo fetile ka matshelo le..

src_text: Mmuso thehile komiti sebetsang ya setekgeniki etellwang pele ke Lefapha la Naha la Bophelo bo Botle, ho arabela seweng sa kholera Hammanskraal Toropong ya Tshwane seng bolaile batho ba 15 ho tloha ka la 24 Motsheanong..
tgt_text: Go samaganwe le namane tona ya tiro ya go batlisisa gore bolwetse jono bo runtse kae ka tswa le mo metsweding ya metsi, diteroko tse di isetsang baagi metsi, mo dipompong le mo Seteišeneng sa go Tlhatswa Metsi a Leswe sa Rooiwal (WWTW).

src_text: Ho etswa mosebetsi moholo wa ho lekola mehlodi yohle ka bang teng ya tshilafalo bang ke mehlodi ya metsi, ditanka tse tsamaisang metsi, dipompo le Tshebetso ya ho Hlwekisa Metsi Ditshila ya Rooiwal (WWTW).
tgt_text: Go fitlha mo motsing ono, ga go bopaki bope jo bo bontshang fa go na le kokwana ya kholera mo metsweding yotlhe eno, mme seno se re raya se re go wa ga bolwetse jono ke ka ntlha ya tiragalo le nngwe e diragetseng ga jaana fetileng mme balwetse ba bangwe ba ba tlhagelelang ga jaana ke ka ntlha ya fa ba tshwaetsana.

src_text: Ho fihlela jwale, ha ho na bopaki ba ho fumanwa ha baktheria ya kholera mehloding ena leng se re kgodisang hore ho ka etsahala ebe kholera bile ketsahalo ya nako le nngwe feela ya tshilafalo, ka ditshwaetso tsa hajwale tseo ka nna ya ba di bakilwe ke ba tshwaeditsweng mme le bona ba tshwaetsa ba bang.
tgt_text: Jaaka go tsweletswe ka ditharabololo, baagi ba motse wa Hammanskraal ba rotloediwa gore ba bedise metsi a tswang mo dipompong mme ba topetse letswatswana pele ba ka nwa.

src_text: Ha mesebetsi ena ntse tswela pele, baahi ba Hammanskraal ba kgothaletswa hore ba bedise metsi pompo mme ba tshele letswai le seng le kae pele ba nwa.
tgt_text: Se sengwe gape, fa motho berekwa ke mala feroga dibete kgotsa na le matshwao motho yo tshwerweng ke mala motho yoo lebe kokelong kgotsa kwa tleliniking ya kwa motseng yo leng mo go ona.

src_text: Ho phaella moo, mang kapa mang ya nang le letshollo, ho nyekelwa ke pelo kapa matshwao tshebetso ya mala lokela ho potlakela ngakeng kapa tleliniking ya lehae.
tgt_text: Tona ya Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe, Rre Senzo Mchunu tla ikopanya le Meyara wa Masepala wa Teropo ya Tshwane, Mokhanselara Cilliers Brink, ka Labotlhano 26 Motsheganong 2023 maitlhomo le go loga leano mmogo la go samagana le go aga sešwa Rooiwal WWTW..

src_text: Letona la Metsi le Bohlweki, Monghadi Senzo Mchunu tla kopana le Ramotse wa Toropo ya Tshwane, Mokhanselara Cilliers Brink, ka Labohlano la 26 Motsheanong 2023 boitekong ba ho theha moralo kopanetsweng wa ntjhafatso seng siilwe ke nako ya Rooiwal WWTW..
tgt_text: Go bona tshedimosetsoka botlalo ka letsetsa mogala wa tshoganyetso o dirang bosigo le motshegare wa Setheo sa Naga sa Malwetse a Fetelanang (NICD) mo go 082 883.

src_text: Bakeng sa dintlha tse ding ka letsetsa mohala wa mahala sebetsang bosiu le motsheare wa Setsi sa Naha sa Mafu Tshwaetsanang (NICD) ho 082 883.
tgt_text: Maele go okobatsa bolwetse jwa kholera teng mo go www.nicd.ac.za.

src_text: Tataiso ya phekolo ya Kholera inthaneteng ho www.nicd.ac.za.
tgt_text: Dipatlisiso tsa Kgweditharo tsa Dipalopalo tsa Badiri (QLFS).

src_text: Patlisiso ya Kotara ya Basebetsi (QLFS).
tgt_text: Kabinete tiisiwa mmoko ke seo pegelo ya 2023 ya QLFS se tlhagisang mo palo ya batho ba ba thapiwang tlhatlogileng garataro mo dikotareng ka go latelana mme palo ya batho ba ba nang le ditiro ba le.

src_text: Kabinete tiisitse hore QLFS ya pele ya 2023 bontshitse keketseho ya botshelela ya kotara ka tatellano ho dipalo tsa mesebetsi le khiro ya batho ba dimilione tse.
tgt_text: 2 milione atumelang mo go ba le.

src_text: 2 haufi haholo le ho fihla khiro ha batho ba dimilione tse.
tgt_text: 4 milione leng palo re neng re le mo go yona pele ga COVID-.

src_text: 4 pele ho matsatsi Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Seno ke se supo se se tlhamaletseng sa gore ikonomi ya naga ya Aforika Borwa boela sekeng..

src_text: Sena ke pontsho hlakileng ya hore moruo wa Afrika Borwa ntlafala ka matla ka mora ho angwa ke sewa sena..
tgt_text: Dipalopalo tsa batho ba ba thapilweng mo kgweditharong ya ntlha di bontsha gore go tlhodiwle ditiro di le 209 000 mo ditirong tsa semmuno mmogo le tse dingwe di le 107 000 mo ditirong tseo seng tsa semmuso mo kgweditharong ya ntlha ya monongwaga.

src_text: Kotara ya pele ya dipalopalo tsa khiro di bontsha hore ke mesebetsi 209 000 thehilweng tlasa taolo ya mmuso mme 107 000 seng tlasa taolo ya mmuso nakong ya kotara ya pele ya selemo.
tgt_text: Tirisanommogo ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Amerika.

src_text: Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le United States (US).
tgt_text: Kabinete totobatsa kgang ya gore botsalano jwa naga ya Aforika Borwa le jwa Amerika santse le jwa go ntshana se se mo inong, jo bo sa nonofileng bile bo tswela maphata otlhe mosola ka go lekana mme seno se latela gore Tona ya Dikamano le Tirisano le Dinaga tsa Boditšhaba, Ngaka Naledi Pandor rwale maoto go kopana le Moambasatara wa naga ya Amerika, Reuben Brigety, go tšhotlha kgang ya gagwe ka go latofatsa naga ya Aforika Borwa gore rekiseditse naga ya Russia dibetsa.

src_text: Kabinete tiisitse hore dikamano tse pakeng tsa Afrika Borwa le US ntse le tsa setswalle, tse matla mme di molemo bakeng sa dinaha ka bobedi ho latela seboka se neng se le dipakeng tsa Letona la Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisano, Ngaka Naledi Pandor le Lenqosa la US Afrika Borwa, Monghadi Reuben Brigety, ya boletseng hore Afrika Borwa fana ka dibetsa ho Russia.
tgt_text: Kabinete boeletsa mafoko yona gore go na le dikgato tse di tlhomilweng tse di itsegeng tsa setipolomate tsa go se gatane menwana ya maoto tse dinaga tsotlhe di itseng gore di tshwanetse go di latela, le yona Amerika, fa go na le sengwe se se ba tshwenyang gore go kgonwe go mekamekanwa le botsalano jwa dinaga ka bobedi.

src_text: Kabinete boletse hape hore metjha ya bodiplomate thehilweng fumaneha dinaheng tsohle, ho kenyeletsa US, ho phahamisa ditaba tse ka hlahang taolong ya dikamano tsa dinaha tse pedi.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke mafoko Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa gore go thankgololwe dipatlisiso tse di sa tseyeng letlhakore go batlisisa mofetsho ono wa gore naga ya Aforika Borwa rekiseditsa naga ya Russia dibetsa.

src_text: Kabinete amohela phatlalatso ya Cyril Ramaphosa ya ho thehwa ha patlisiso ikemetseng ho hlahloba diqoso tsa phano ya dibetsa tsa Afrika Borwa ho Russia.
tgt_text: Dintlha tse di ribololwang ke dipatlisiso tseno di tla itsisiwe mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo.

src_text: Dintlha tsa patlisiso di tla phatlalatswa ka nako loketseng.
tgt_text: Tirisanommogo ya naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Singapore.

src_text: Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le Singapore.
tgt_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa ne amogetse Tonakgolo Lee Hsien Loong wa Naga ya Rephaboliki ya Singapore ka Labobedi, 16 Motsheganong..

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile amohela Tonakgolo Lee Hsien Loong wa Rephabliki ya Singapore ka Labobedi la 16 Motsheanong..
tgt_text: Naga ya Singapore beeletsa tota mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa, dipeeletso tsa teng di feta R5 bilione mo maphateng a jaaka la tlhagisodikuno, la ditirelo tsa matlole le la thekiso ya dintlo.

src_text: Singapore ke motsetedi ya bohlokwa Afrika Borwa, ka letsete la dibilione tse fetang tse hlano tsa diranta ka kakaretso lefapheng le kang la tlhahiso, ditshebeletso tsa ditjhelete le thekiso ya matlo.
tgt_text: Ditumelano tse di saenilweng magareng ga dinaga ka bobedi maitlhomo tsona ke go gagamatsa tirisanommogo mo mererong ya kgwebisano, dipeeletso, thuto mmogo le ya sesole..

src_text: Ditumellano tse saennweng dipakeng tsa dinaha tsena tse pedi di reretswe ho matlafatsa kgwebo, letsete, thuto le tshebedisano ya tshireletso..
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Moporesitente ya Leano la Tiragatso ya Kabo ya Ditirelo le le Ikaegileng ka Ditikologo (DDM) la Porofense ya Kapa Bophirima.

src_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Mohlala wa Ntlafatso ya Setereke (DDM) sa Kapa Bophirimela.
tgt_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa garetse Imbizo ya Moporesitente ya borataro ya DDM kwa Porofenseng ya Kapa Bophirima, kwa Masepaleng wa Selegae wa Drakenstein, mo Tikologong ya Cape Winelands ka Labotlhano wa la bo 19 Motsheganong..

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile isa DDM ya botshelela ya Imbizo ya Mopresidente Kapa Bophirimela, Masepaleng wa Lehae wa Drakenstein, Seterekeng sa Cape Winelands, ka Labohlano la 19 Motsheanong..
tgt_text: Moporesitente ne goga kwa pele baeteledipele botlhe ba maphata otlhe le mararo puso ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go se Nne le Ope yo Tlogelwang kwa Morago”.

src_text: Mopresidente ile etella pele moifo tswang mafapheng ohle mmuso mararo tlasa sehlooho se reng: “Le se ke la Siya Mang kapa Mang ka Morao”.
tgt_text: Morago ga Imbizo Moporesitente ne jela nala lefelo le le gaufi le la Letsholo la Kago ya Mafelo Bodulo la Vlakkeland, mme leno ke la ntlha ka bogolo le le ka ga kago ya dintlo tsa setšhaba go fitlha mo motsing ono mo Masepaleng wa Selegae wa Drakenstein.

src_text: Imbizo ne etelletswe pele ke ketelo ya Mopresidente sebakeng sa Ntlafatso ya Bodulo ba Batho Vlakkeland Catalytic haufi leng ntshetsopele ya matlo setjhaba kgolo ka ho fetisisa ho fihle jwale Masepaleng wa Lehae wa Drakenstein.
tgt_text: Letsholo leno la kago le le simolotseng mo ngwageng wa 2017 tla re fa re garelwa la naya beng ba dintlo tseno ba le 2 556 magae..

src_text: Ntlafatso tswetseng pele ka 2017 ha feela tla fana ka matlo 2 556 ho batho ba tshwanelehang..
tgt_text: Letsholo la go aga dintlo di le 942 kgato ya lona ya ntlha setse simolotswe, mme dintlo di le 454 di setse di feditswe go agiwa fa di le 301 tsona di santse di agiwa.

src_text: Kaho ya matlo 942 Karolo ya Pele ntse tswela pele 454 se phethilwe mme 301 ntse hahwa.
tgt_text: Botlhokwa jwa porojeke eno ke go thusa ka ditsela tse di farologaneng tsa kemonokeng ka matlole go thusa ba ba senang letso le bao letseno la bona le fitlhang go R3 500 (ka letsholo la Breaking New Ground), mmogo le go dirisa letsholo la Finance Linked Individual Subsidy go thusa bao ka ngwaga ba iponelang megolo e magareng ga R3 501 le R22.

src_text: Bohlokwa ba projeke ena ke hore haha mefuta fapaneng ya dikgetho tsa matlo ho tloha ho batho ba fumanang moputso wa R0 ho ya ho R3 500 (tlasa Ho Qetella Motheo Motjha), ho Lenaneo la Ditjhelete le Hokahaneng le Motho ka Mong, bakeng sa batho ba fumanang moputso pakeng tsa R3 501 le R22 000 ka selemo.
tgt_text: Mo porojekeng eno go agiwa ka bobedi dintlo tsa setšhaba le tsa Bagale ba Sesole.

src_text: Monyetla wa Bodulo ba Setjhaba hammoho le wa Bahlabani ba Sesole teng projekeng ena.
tgt_text: Leeto la go Lekola Maemo kwa Masepaleng wa Teropokgolo ya eThekwini le kwa Masepaleng wa Tikologo ya uMgungundlovu ka la bo 18 le la bo 19 Motsheganong.

src_text: Ketelo ya Bolebedi ya Mmasepala wa Motsemoholo wa eThekwini le Mmasepala wa Setereke sa uMgungundlovu ka la 18 le la 19 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Jaaka le karolo ya Leeto la go Lekola Maemo go Diragatsa DDM, mo leetong la gagwe la go lekola maemo Motlatsamoporesitente Paul Mashatile ne buisana le bannaleseabe mo maphateng thuto le tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni, temothuo, dikhomese le diintaseteri nngwe ya diporojeke tse di botlhokwa tse di jetsweng nala ke Projeke ya go Fetola Maemo ya Ntshongweni leng teng koo go agiwang Teropo e tla Dirisang Thekenoloji magareng ga Durban lePietermaritzburg.

src_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente Paul Mashatile ile buisana le batshehetsi ba amehang ho tsa thuto le thupello, temo, kgwebo le diindasteri nakong ya leeto la bookamedi Mmasepaleng wa Motsemoholo wa eThekwini le Mmasepaleng wa Setereke sa uMgungundlovu le karolo ya DDM ya ketelo ya bolebedi.
tgt_text: Porojeke eno tla tsosolosa ikonomi mo lefelong leno, mme tla tsenya letseno ka go tlhagisa dipeeletso tse di ka fitlhang go R15 bilione mo dingwageng tse di tlang tse di ka fitlhang magareng ga di le 10 go fitlha go di le.

src_text: Diprojeke tse ka sehloohong tse etetsweng ne le tsa sebaka sa Projeke ya Ntshongweni Catalytic, moo Smart City ntse ahwa pakeng tsa Durban le Pietermaritzburg.
tgt_text: Mafaratlhatlha Metsi.

src_text: Projeke ena tla tsosolosa mosebetsi wa moruo sebakeng seo tla ba le tlatsetso ya diranta tse dibilione tse ka bang 15 tsa letsete dilemo tse latelang tse 10 ho isa ho tse.
tgt_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa ne jetse nala Porojeke ya Metsi a Tshologang kwa Dithabeng tsa Lesotho ka Labobedi wa la bo 23 Motsheganong 2023 mme ko teng ne tsaya karolo mo letsholong la go thankgolola kgato ya bobedi ya porojeke eno.

src_text: Tsamaiso ya Phepelo ya Metsi.
tgt_text: Jaaka porojeke eno saenetswe go diragadiwa dingwaga di le dintsi tse di fetileng mmogo le go diegisiwa, mokete ono a bontsha gore jaanong tiro mo letsholong le le botlhokwa leno e leng mabapi le letsholo le legolo la dinaga di le pedi tla diragadiwa.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile etela Morero wa Metsi Dihlaba tsa Lesotho ka Labobedi la 23 Motsheanong 2023 leng moo ileng kenya letsoho moketeng wa ho fetola lekote la Mohato wa 2 wa projeke saennwe dilemong tse mmalwa tse fetileng mme ile wa dieha, mokete ona ke pontsho ya ho potlakisa mohato wa dinaha tsena tse pedi.
tgt_text: Porojeke ya Metsi a Tshologang kwa Dithabeng tsa Lesotho botlhokwa thata mo go direng gore porofense ya Gauteng, Foreistata, Mpumalanga, Bokone Bophirima le Kapa Bokone di nne le metsi.

src_text: Morero wa Metsi Dihlaba tsa Lesotho bohlokwa bakeng sa ho netefatsa polokeho ya phepelo ya metsi Gauteng, Foreistata, Mpumalanga, Leboya Bophirima le Kapa Bophirima.
tgt_text: Dipeeletso mo mafaratlhatlheng metsi go fetola matshelo maAforika Borwa di tswelela mo go ntshitsweng R14 bilione go neela dimasepala go samagana le matsapa tshalelomorago ya mafaratlhatlhatlha metsi, mme matlole ao tla tswa mo Mading Kago ya Mafaratlhatlha Magolo Metsi (RBIG) mmogo le mo Mading Ditirelo tsa Mafaratlhatlha Metsi (WSIG).

src_text: Letsete tsamaisong ya phepelo ya metsi bakeng sa ho ntlafatsa bophelo ba MaAfrika Borwa le ntse le tswela pele, ka phano ya diranta tse ka hodimo ho dibilione tse 14 ho bomasepala bakeng sa ho shebana le ditsamaiso tsa phepelo ya metsi tse saletseng morao, ka Thuso ya Infrastraktjha Kgolo ya Mabatowa Mangata (RBIG) le Thuso ya Infrastraktjha ya Ditshebeletso tsa Metsi (WSIG).
tgt_text: RBIG tla dirisa madi go thusa diporojeke di le 130 mme WSIG yona tla thusa diporojeke di le 400 naga ka bophara.

src_text: RBIG tla sebediswa diprojekeng tse 130 mme WSIG yona abelwe diprojeke tse fetang 400 ho phatlalla le naha.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke kgatelopele e diriwang ke Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe (DWS) mo go lwantshaneng le bonweenwee mo madi ka fitlha go R600 milione buseditsweng lefapha ke ditlamo tse di neng di neelwa dithendara go se mo molaong.

src_text: Kabinete boetse thabisitswe ke hore Lefapha la Metsi le Bohlweki (DWS) le nka mehato ya ho lwantsha bobodu ka ho busetswa ha dimilione tse ka bang R600 ke dikhamphani tse unneng molemo ka ho fumana dithendara tse sa tlwaelehang.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa gape le ke dikgato tsa thibelo le taolo go fedisa tiriso ya madi go sa mo molaong, tshenyo ya madi le tirisobotlhaswa ya madi.

src_text: Kabinete boetse hokometse mehato ya taolo ya thibelo behilweng ke lefapha ho fedisa ditshenyehelo tse sa tlwaelehang, tse se nang ditholwana le tse se nang thuso.
tgt_text: Dikabo tsa Tlhokomelo ya Baagi.

src_text: Kgau ya Tshireletso ya Setjhaba.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa neetswe tlotlo ke Setheo sa Lefatshe sa Tlhokomelo ya Baagi (ISSA) ka go abela Kabo ya Ngwaga wa 2023 ya Kontinente ya Aforika ya Tlotlo ya Tiro e Tswileng Diatla mo go Tlhokomeleng Baagi, mme kabo eno akgola dipeeletso tsa puso mo matshelong bana, segolobogolo mo baneng ba ba tswang kwa malapeng a dikobo dikhutshwane.

src_text: Afrika Borwa fumane Kgau ya Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba ya Tshireletso ya Setjhaba (ISSA) le Ditlwaelo tse Ntle ya maemo ho Tshireletso ya Setjhaba bakeng sa Afrika 2023 elang hloko letsete la mmuso bophelong ba bana ba rona, haholo ba tswang malapeng futsanehileng le nang le mathata.
tgt_text: Maemo naga ya Aforika Borwa go tsenela dikabo tseno tse di tlotlegang ne bediwa: “Go atolosa ka iketlo tlhokomelo ya baagi go thusa bana ba ba dikobo dikhutshwane: Mo ntlheng ya go Neela Megolo ya Bana, mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa ”.

src_text: Tokelo ya ho kena ha Afrika Borwa bakeng sa kgau ena ya maemo ne na le sehlooho se reng: “Katoloso ya hanyane ka hanyane ya kakaretso ya tshireletso ho bana ba nang le mathata: Taba ya Krante ya Tlhokomelo ya Ngwana, Afrika Borwa”.
tgt_text: Mo dikabong tseno go amogetswe dikopo di le 138 go tswa mo dinageng tsa Aforika tseo leng leloko di feta di le..

src_text: Kakaretso ya dikenyeletso tse 138 ile ya fumanwa ho tswa ho ditho tse 48 tsa mekgatlo tswang dinaheng tse fetang 30 tse Afrika.
tgt_text: Thuso ya baagi ke ntlha e botlhokwa thata mo letsholong la puso la go fedisa khumanego mme bile gape ntlha eno botlhokwa thata mo go busetseng batho ba borona seriti.

src_text: Thuso ya rona ya setjhaba ke motheo wa mmuso wa leano la ho fedisa tlala mme ka sehlohong bakeng sa ho kgutlisa seriti sa batho ba habo rona.
tgt_text: Thulaganyo ya tlhokomelo ya baagi ya naga ya Aforika Borwa ke nngwe ya dithulaganyo tse dikgolo mo lefatsheng, mo batho ba ba unngwelwang mo go yona ba fetang ba le dimilione di le.

src_text: Tsamaiso ya tshireletso ya Afrika Borwa hara tse kgolo ka ho fetisisa lefatsheng, mme na le baamohedi ba fetang dimilione tse.

tgt_text: Ka Labobedi wa la bo 30 Motsheganong 2023, Tona ya Tlhabololo ya Loago, Mme Lindiwe Zulu, mmogo le Tona ya Tlhabololo ya Loago Ditirelo tsa Bosiamisi le tsa Kgopololo ya Batshwariwa, Rre Ronald Lamola, ba tla tshwara Dipuo tsa bona tsa Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo mme dintlha tsa ona ka ga dikopano le bobegakgang di tla itsisiwe mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo..

src_text: Ka Labobedi la 30 Motsheanong 2023, Letona la Ntlafatso ya Setjhaba, Mofumahadi Lindiwe Zulu, le Letona la Toka le Tshokollo ya Batshwaruwa, Monghadi Ronald Lamola, ba tla tshwara seboka sa Ditlhophiso tsa Bajete mme dintlha tsa puisano ya bona le boraditaba di tla fanwa ka nako loketseng..
tgt_text: Puo ya Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya Kantoro ya Moporesitente tla phasaladiwa ka Laboraro wa la bo 31 Motsheganong 2023 mme ka Labobedi wa la bo 30 Motsheganong 2023 go tla tshwarwa kopano le bobegakgang mabapi le Kgatelopele e Dirilweng ka Phetogo ya Letsholo la Phetolo ya Ditheo mmogo le Matsholo Ditiro a tsamaisiwang ka Operation Vulindlela.

src_text: Ditlhophiso tsa Bajete ya Mopresidente di tla tekwa ka Laboraro la 31 Motsheanong 2023, mme puisano le boraditaba mabapi le Kgatelopele ka Diphetoho tsa Moralo le Mehato ya Khiro ka kgokahano le Operation Vulindlela, di tla tshwarwa ka Labobedi la 30 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Segopotso sa Ngwaga wa bo 20 sa Letsatsi la go Keteka Boaforika mmogo le go Keteka Letsholo la go Sekasekana le Dinaga tsa Aforika.

src_text: Sehopotso sa Dilemo tse 20 sa Letsatsi la Afrika le Tsela ya Tekolo ya Semphato ya Afrika (APRM).
tgt_text: Kabinete mmogo le maAforika Borwa otlhe ba keteka mmogo kontinente ya Aforika le lefatshe ka bophara Letsatsi la go Keteka Boaforika ka la bo 25 Motsheganong.

src_text: Kabinete le maAfrika Borwa ohle ikopantse le kontinente ya Afrika le lefatshe lohle ho keteka Letsatsi la Afrika ka Labone la 25 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Yo ngwaga botlhokwa segolobogolo ka ntlha ya gore ke ngwaga yo go ketekewing segopotso sa bo 60 sa go saeniwa ga lekwalo la ditumelano la Mokgatlho o Tshwaraganeng wa Aforika (OAU) e feleditseng le Mokgatlho o Tshwaraganeng wa Aforika (AU).

src_text: Selemo sena se bohlokwa ka ho kgetheha kaha se tshwaya sehopotso sa bo-60 sa ho saenwa ha molao wa motheo wa Mokgatlo wa Kopano ya Afrika leng selelekela sa Kopano ya Afrika.
tgt_text: Molaetsamogolo wa mekete ya ngwaga wa 2023 – “Go potlakisa go tsenya tirisong Letsholo la Kgwebisano ya Dinaga tsa Kontinente ya Aforika Ntle le go Kgorelediwa ke Sepe” – akgola kgatelopele e diriwang mo go tsenyeng tirisong lefelo le legolo mo lefatsheng mo mererong ya kgwebisano.

src_text: Mookotaba bakeng sa mekete ya 2023– “Ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Potlakiso ya Sebaka sa Kgwebo Lokolohileng Kontinenteng ya Afrika” – ho ela hloko mehato nkilweng bakeng sa ho kenya tshebetsong sebaka se seholo ka ho fetisisa lefatsheng sa tokoloho ya kgwebo.
tgt_text: Monongwaga Kgwedi ya Aforika tla ketekiwa ka nako le nngwe le ya go keteka segopotso sa bo 20 sa Tsamaiso ya Tebosešwa ya Dinagaleloko tsa Aforika (APRM) leng maitlhomo go tlhotlheletsa tsamaiso e lolameng ya puso mo kontinenteng ka go dirisa thulaganyo ya go ithuta mo go ba bangwe le go ikela tlhoko

src_text: Sehopotso sa Kgwedi ya Afrika sa selemong sena se dumellanang le sehopotso sa bo-20 sa APRM, se reretswe ho sebedisa taolo ntle ka hara kontinente ka thuto ya papiso hlophisitsweng le boitekolo

src_text: Namakwa Special Economic Zone (SEZ).
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula SEZ ya kwa Namakwa e kwa Aggeneys mo porofenseng ya Kapa Bokone.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaelletse monwana ho qollwa ha Namakwa SEZ Aggeneys, Kapa Leboya.
tgt_text: Lefelo leno le neseditswe pula go ya ka Molao wa Mafelo a Itlhophileng Ikonomi wa ngwaga wa 2014 (Molao wa bo 16 wa 2014) mmogo le SEZ eo tshitshintsweng eo leng karolo ya Letsholo la Dipeeletso la Moporesitente.

src_text: Tlhahiso ya ho qolla etswa tumellanong le Molao wa Dibaka tse Kgethehileng tsa Moruo wa 2014 (Molao 16 wa 2014) mme SEZ sisintsweng, ke karolo ya Tshebetso ya Matsete ya Mopresidente.
tgt_text: SEZ ya kwa Namakwa tla letlelela dikgato tsa go bula meepo, go tlhagisa leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo, go agiwa ga mafaratlhatlha, motlakase wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa mmogo le tlhagiso ya dikuno tsa temothuo.

src_text: Namakwa SEZ tla ba senotlolo sa melemo ya morafo, tlhahiso ya hydrogen tala, ntlafatso ya infrastraktjha, eneji ka ntjhafatswang le tshebetso ya temo.
tgt_text: Makala ano botlhokwa mo go tlholeng ditiro le mo go godiseng ikonomi ya porofense ya Kapa Bokone le ya naga..

src_text: Mafapha bohlokwa bakeng sa tlhahiso ya mosebetsi le ntlafatso ya moruo wa Kapa Leboya le naha..
tgt_text: Go setse go dirilwe maikano dipeeletso feta R29 bilione mo kgatong ya ntlha ya SEZ.

src_text: Matsete fetang diranta tse dibilione tse 29 se ntse behetswe thoko bakeng sa mohato wa pele wa SEZ.
tgt_text: Mo go ona go akarediwa Vedanta Zinc (R16 bilione), Frontier Rare Earth (R13 bilione), Hive Energy (R200 milione) le RRS Trade and Investment (R100 milione)..

src_text: Ona kenyeletsa boitlamo ho tswa ho Vedanta Zinc (Diranta tse dibilione tse 16), Frontier Rare Earth (Diranta tse dibilione tse 13), Hive Energy (Diranta tse dimilione tse 200) le RRS Trade and Investment (Diranta tse dimilione tse 100)..
tgt_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Kgatiso ya Boraro ya Leano la Naga la Mafaratlhatlha Metsi (NWRS-3) sa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Kgatiso ya Boraro ya Leano la Mohlodi wa Metsi Setjhaba (NWRS-3).
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula NWRS-3 ya 2023 gore tsenngwe tirisong mme leano leno le gokelela batlhankedi ba bagolo botlhe le ditheo tsotlhe tseo di rweleng maikarabelo go tsenya tirong Molao wa Metsi Naga wa ngwaga wa 1998 (Molao wa bo 36 wa 1998).

src_text: Kabinete tjhaelletse monwana NWRS-3 ya 2023, bakeng sa phethahatso, mme leano lena ke le tlamang ho bolaodi bohle le mekgatlo ho kenya tshebetsong Molao wa Naha wa Metsi wa 1998 (Molao 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: Leano leno le tsamaisana le tshekatsheko e diriwang morago ga dingwaga tse dingwe le tse dingwe di le tharo ya NWRS-2, mo go nopotsweng dikarolo tse le atlegileng mo go tsona mmogo le dikarolo tse go santseng go na le dikgwetlho mo go tsona..

src_text: Leano lena le susumeditswe ke tlhahlobo ya dilemo tse tharo ya NWRS-2 qollotseng dibaka tsa katleho le dibaka tse ntseng di tobana le mathata..
tgt_text: NWRS-3 na le dintlha di le tharo tse di botlhokwa leng go dira bonnete jwa gore metsi le kgeleloleswe di tlisa tlhabologo, go fedisa khumanego le go se lekalekane, go nna le seabe mo ikonoming le mo go tlholeng ditiro, mme ka jalo metsi tshwanetswe go tlhokomelwa dirisiwe phepafadiwe laolwe le go elwa tlhoko ka go somarela le ka go abela batho ka go lekana.

src_text: NWRS-3 na le merero meraro ya sehlooho leng ntlafatso ya metsi le bohlweki lokelang ho tshehetswa, ho fediswa ha tlala le ho se lekalekane, tlatsetso moruong le tlhahiso ya mosebetsi, mme metsi lokela ho sireletswa, ho sebediswa, ho ntlafatswa, ho hlokomelwa le ho laolwa ka tsela tsitsitseng le ka ho lekana.
tgt_text: Leano leno le tlhagisa ditshitshinyo tse di utlwagalang mo go oketseng tlamelo ya metsi, go foka tiriso ya metsi, go tlhokomela ka tshwanelo metsi le kgeleloleswe, go tsenya tirisong melao ya go laola lephata la metsi le kgeleloleswe, go abela setšhaba metsi gore re fetole batsholateu, go rotloetsa tirisanommogo le ditheo tsa boditšhabatšhaba mmogo le go tlhokomela metsi le kgeleloleswe ka fa tlase ga maemo phetogo ya maemo loapi..

src_text: Leano lena le etsa ditshisinyo tse tshwarehang bakeng sa ho eketsa phepelo ya metsi, ho fokotsa tlhokeho ya metsi, taolo atlehang ya metsi le bohlweki, ho laola lefapha la metsi le bohlweki, ho aba metsi bakeng sa phetoho, ho kgothaletsa tshebedisano ya matjhaba, le ho laola metsi le bohloweki tlasa maemo lehodimo ntseng fetoha..

tgt_text: Pegelo e ka ga Dikgato tse Lefapha la Sesole (DoD) le di Tsenyang Tirisong go Samagana le Maitsholo Masole Sesole sa Tshireletso ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa (SANDF) a Rometsweng kwa Dinageng tse di Nang le Dikgotlang go Dira Bonnete jwa gore go Rena Kagiso.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Mehato Kentsweng Tshebetsong ke Lefapha la Tshireletso (DoD) ho Sebetsana le Diketso le Boitshwaro ba Ditho tsa Sesole sa Naha sa Tshireletso sa Afrika Borwa (SANDF) tse Romelwang Mererong ya ho Boloka Kgotso.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse pegelo ya dikgatelopele tseo naga ya Aforika Borwa di dirileng mo go tseeleng dikgato maitsholo a mangwe masole SANDF a romilweng go dira bonnete jwa gore go rena kagiso mo mafelong ao ba romilweng mo go ona go ralala le kontinente.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tlaleho mabapi le kgatelopele eo Afrika Borwa e etsang ho sebetsana le boitshwaro ba ditho tse ding tsa SANDF tse rometsweng bakeng sa ho boloka kgotso ho phatlalla le kontinente.
tgt_text: SANDF ke setheo se naga ipelang ka sona ka ntlha ya fa se tsaya karolo mo matsholong go tlisa kagiso mo kontinenteng go dira gore mafelo mo go ona go runtseng ntwa ya matlho mahibidu mo kontinenteng ya Aforika go rene kutlwano le kagiso mo go ona ka go ikamanya le tiro ya Dinagakopano (UN)..

src_text: SANDF se hlokometse mohlodi wa boikgantsho ba naha ha ntse kenya letsoho mererong ya ho boloka kgotso kontinenteng, bakeng sa tshireletso tsitsitseng le kgotso dinaheng tsa Afrika tse ruthuthilweng ke ntwa tse tlasa dithuso tsa Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN)..
tgt_text: Ka ntlha ya ditatofatso tse di runtseng mo ngwageng wa 2015 tsa gore mangwe masole a rometsweng go thusa ka letsholo la go tlisa kagiso latofadiwa ka mekgwa e tswileng mo taolong ya thobalano, Setlhophatiro sa Ditona se ne sa tlhomiwa mo ngwageng wa 2019 gore se batlisise, mo go DoD, fa dikgetse tseno tsa go robalana le baagi ba dinaga tseo ka go ba solofetsa legodimo le lefatshe le go ba tlhorisa (SEA) le boammaruri..

src_text: Ka diqoso tsa ditlolo tsa thobalano tse amang masole bolokang kgotso tse qadileng ho hlahella ka 2015, Sehlopha sa Tshebetso sa Matona se ile sa thehwa ka 2019 bakeng sa ho etsa dipatlisiso ka diqoso tsa tlhekefetso ya peto le tlhekefetso (SEA) ka hare ho DoD..
tgt_text: Kabinete kgotsofaditswe ke dikgato tse di setseng di tserwe go samagana le ditiragalo tsa SEA mo matsholong go thusa go tlisa kagiso SANDF.

src_text: Kabinete kgotsofaditswe ke letoto la mehato kentsweng tshebetsong ya ho sebetsana le diketsahalo tsa SEA mererong ya ho boloka kgotso ya SANDF.
tgt_text: UN tsaya Aforika Borwa jaaka sekai mme akgotse ka fao naga setseng samagane le matsapa ano go fedisa SEA mo go SANDF.

src_text: UN nka Afrika Borwa na le ditlwaelo tse ntle ka ho fetisisa mme thoholeditse naha ka kgatelopele eo e entseng ya ho hlakola SEA ka hare ho SANDF.
tgt_text: Kabinete gateletse gore ga kitla letlelela maitsholo a tsamaisanang le SEA phuaganya tiro ntle e itsegeng SANDF e dirang mo kontinenteng..

src_text: Kabinete hatisitse hore ditlwaelo tsa SEA di ke ke tsa dumellwa ho senya tlaleho ntle ya SANDF kontinenteng..
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya go Keteka Seabe sa Bašwa ya Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Batjha ya.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Letsholo la Ngwaga wa 2023 la Kgwedi ya Bašwa ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go potlakisa thuso ya bašwa mo mererong ya ikonomi gore re kgone go nna le bokamoso jo bo sa tseweng ke phefo”.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaelletse monwana Lenaneo la Kgwedi ya Batjha la 2023 tlasa mookotaba: “Ho potlakisa tokoloho ya moruo wa batjha bakeng sa bokamoso ba moshwelella”.
tgt_text: Motlatsamoporesitente Mashatile tla ema ka lefoko Letsatsi leno la Naga mme lona le tla ketekiwa matsatsi le mabedi monongwaga go tloga ka la bo 16 go fitlha ka la bo 17 Seetebosigo 2023 kwa Mangaung Outdoor Sport Centre, Mangaung, Bloemfontein, kwa Porofenseng ya Foreistata.

src_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente Mashatile tla beha puo Letsatsing la Setjhaba leo selemong sena le tla ketekwa ka matsatsi mabedi ho tloha ka la 16 ho isa ho la 17 Phuptjane 2023, Setsing sa Dipapadi sa Mangaung, Bloemfontein, Foreistata.
tgt_text: Mo matsatsing le mabedi ao, bašwa ba tla neelwa tšhono ya go buisana le Ditona le Batlatsatona mmogo le ba bangwe ba bannaleseabe mo dikatisong tse di farologaneng tsa go itlhamela dikgwebo le go tlhatlhelelwa ka bokgoni go tswa mo pusong le mo badirisanimmogong ba bangwe mo mererong ya loago..

src_text: Matsatsing ao mabedi, ho tla ba le monyetla wa hore batjha ba nke karolo puisanong le Matona, Batlatsi ba Matona le baamehi ba bang ho dithupello tse fapafapaneng, menyetla ya kgwebo le ntlafatso fumanehang ka hara mmuso le balekane ba setjhaba..
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Bašwa tla thankgololwa ka Labone wa la bo 1 Seetebosigo 2023 ke Tona mo Kantorong ya Moporesitente e Rweleng Maikarabelo Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba Nang le Bogolofadi bong Ngaka Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma kwa Musiamong wa Hector Pieterson Memorial kwa Soweto..

src_text: Kgwedi ya Batjha tla thakgolwa ka Labone la 1 Phuptjane ke Letona la Kantoro ya Mopresidente wa Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba Nang le Boqhwala, ke Ngaka Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma le Hector Pieterson Memorial le Musiamong wa Soweto..
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go gagamatsa matsapa go netefatsa gore bašwa ba fitlhelela ditšhono tsa go nna le seabe mo ikonoming.

src_text: Kabinete ipileditse ho baahi hore ba matlafatse boiteko ba ho netefatsa hore batjha ba fumana menyetla tla ba dumella ho ba le seabo moruong.
tgt_text: Puso, jaaka le yona e thapang batho ka bontsi tsibogetse botlhokwa jwa tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni mmogo le go thapiwa ga bašwa ka go dira gore bašwa ba bantsi ba ba alogileng ba thapiwe mo matsholong go ithutela tiro mo Lephateng la Ditirelo tsa Puso go tla go ithutela tiro teng.

src_text: Mmuso, jwaloka mohiri ya itlhommeng pele arabetse tlhokong ya ntlafatso ya bokgoni le khiro ya batjha ka ho dumella ho hirwa ha baithuti ba sa sebetseng hore ba fumane boiphihlelo ho Lenaneo la Boithuti la Tshebeletso ya Mmuso.
tgt_text: Puso samagane gape le go tsenya tirisong Sekgwama sa Matlole go Thapa Baagi (SEF) mmogo le go tsosolosa Setheo Naga sa Ditirelo tsa Bašwa (NYS) mo matsholo ano tla tlholelang bašwa ba le diketekete ditiro mo ikonoming.

src_text: Mmuso boetse kentse tshebetsong Letlole la Khiro ya Setjhaba (SEF) mme wa tsosolosa boiteko ba tlhahiso ya mesebetsi ya Tshebeletso ya Naha ya Batjha (NYS) hulelang dikete tsa batjha ho tsa moruo.
tgt_text: Letsholo la Moporesidente la Kemonokeng ya Bašwa ka Ditiro le setse le atlegile mo go emeng nokeng ditšhono di le milione le halofo ka megolo ya letseno la nakwana, go tsenya tirong batho ba le milione le mongwe, ditšhono di le 250 000 tsa go tlhatlhelelwa ka bokgoni le mo tirong, ditšhono di le 250 000 tsa go lefelwa mabapi le ditirelo tse di abilweng mmogo le bašwa ba le 500 000 ba ba kgonang go itirela letseno le le tla gogang sebaka.

src_text: Kenello ya Mopresidente Khirong ya Batjha se ntse atlehile ho tshehetsa ho fumaneha ha menyetla dimilione tse.
tgt_text: Jaaka re tsena mo Kgweding eno ya Bašwa, puso gakolola bašwa gore ba ikwadise mo sefalaneng sa SAYouth.mobi jaaka bankane ba bona ba le dimilione di le dine bona ba setse ba ikwadisitse, mme seno ke sefalana se ditiro di phasaladiwang teng.

src_text: 5 ya meputso ya nakwana, milione le nngwe ya dibaka tse thehilweng mosebetsing, menyetla 250 000 ya thuto kopantseng mosebetsi, menyetla 250 000 ya ditshebeletso tse lefang mme batjha ba 500 000 ba tshwarehile ka mesebetsi fanang ka moputso.
tgt_text: Go Tshwara Mmogo Foramo ya bo Robedi ya Dikgwebo tsa Temothuo tsa Aforika mo Dipatlisisong tsa Lephata la Temothuo (FARA) e Leng Karolo ya Beke ya Saense Mmogo le Kopanokgothakgothe ya Yona ya Borobongwe.

src_text: Ha ntse re kena Kgweding ya Batjha, mmuso hopotsa batjha ho ingodisa ho SAYouth.mobi kaha batjha ba bang ba dimilione tse nne ba se ba ntse ba ingodisitse, moo menyetla ya mosebetsi ka fihlellwang.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tshwara mmogo FARA e Leng Karolo ya Beke ya Saense Mmogo le Kopanokgothakgothe ya Yona ya Borobongwe gore tshwarelwe kwa Durban go tloga ka la bo 5 go fitlha ka la bo 9 Seetebosigo..

src_text: Seboka se Kopanetsweng sa Foramo Bakeng sa Patlisiso ya Seboka sa bo-8 sa Afrika (FARA) sa Kgwebo ya Temo Afrika le Beke ya Saense hammoho le Seboka sa sona sa Kakaretso sa bo-.
tgt_text: FARA ke mokgatlho mogolo mo kontinenteng o rwelelng maikarabelo go disa le go tsamaisa dipatlisiso tsa merero ya temothuo mmogo le go godisa boitlhamedi ka fa kontinenteng..

src_text: Kabinete amohetse hore Afrika Borwa be motsamaisi mmoho wa Seboka sa FARA sa bo-8 sa Kgwebo ya Temo le Beke ya Saense Afrika hammoho le Seboka sa sona sa Kakaretso sa bo-9 Durban ho tloha ka la 5 ho ya ho la 9 Phuptjane..
tgt_text: Ka go tshwara kopano eno, naga ya Aforika Borwa tla unngwelwa ke tirisanommogo eno mmogo le tirisanommogo magareng ga ditheo tsa dipatlisiso tsa temothuo ka fa kontinenteng gonne mo go yona go tla tlhabanwa botlhale ka tsa saense le dipatlisiso tse di mabapi le temothuo.

src_text: FARA ke mokgatlo hlophisitsweng wa dikontinente ikarabellang ka ho thusa le ho hokahanya patlisiso ya temo le kgatelopele ya boqapi kontinenteng..
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tsaya dipatlisiso mo mererong ya temothuo jaaka selo se se botlhokwa fa go tla mo tlhabologong, segolo jang fa re lebelela maemo phetogoloapi mmogo le mabaka mangwe a dirang gore naga tlhoke dijo tse di lekaneng godise maemo ikonomi le go tlhola ditiro.

src_text: Ka ho tsamaisa ketsahalo ena, Afrika Borwa tla rua molemo ka tshebedisano mmoho le dikamano le mekgatlo ya kontinente ya temo le patlisiso, ka ho arolelana ditlwaelo tsa saense ya temo le patlisiso.
tgt_text: Go solofelwa gore kopano eno tla ngokela barongwa ba le 800 kwa porofenseng ya KwaZulu-Natal le ya Gauteng, mme seno se tla thusa ikonomi ya rona..

src_text: Afrika Borwa nka patlisiso ya temo bakeng sa ntlafatso le bohlokwa, haholo ho nahannwe ka phetoho maemong lehodimo le dintlha tse ding tse amang bokgoni ba naha ba ho finyella kanetso ya dijo, ntlafatso ya moruo le khiro.

tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di samagana gape le dikarolo tsa Molao wa IPID wa 2011 tseo Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo di supileng gore ga di mo molaong, mme tsona ke tse di neelang Tona ya Mapodisi maatla go emisa Tlhogo ya Setheo mo tirong ya gagwe, go tseela Tlhogo ya Setheo dikgato tsa go mo kgalema morago ga gore mo emise kwa tirong, mmogo le go tebela Tlhogo ya Setheo mo tirong.

src_text: Bili fetola Molao wa IPID wa 2011 (Molao 1 wa 2011), mme etsa ditshisinyo tse reretsweng ho matlafatsa setheo le tshebetso ikemetseng ya IPID, ho etsa hore “kahlolo ho tswa nyeweng ya McBride” sebetse.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono tshitshinya gore dithulaganyo tsa go thapa Tlhogo ya Setheo nne tse di senang lehunelo mme nne e tseneletseng le e fatololang ka tsenelelo gore maitsholo motlhankedi wa IPID gore go thapiwe yo gagwe leng a siameng.

tgt_text: Ka Mosupologo wa la bo 29 Motsheganong 2023 Moporesitente Ramaphosa tla tsibogela taletso ya go ya moletlong wa go Tlhomiwa mo Setulong ga Moporesitente yo Tlhophilweng Semmuso Rre Bola Ahmed Tinubu wa Naga ya Nigeria.

src_text: Tlhomamiso ya Mopresidente wa Rephabliki ya Bofederale ya Nigeria.
tgt_text: Go tsibogeleng taletso eno ga Moporesitente go bontsha maikemisetso go batla go tswelela go dirisana mmogo magareng ga dinaga ka bobedi leng Aforika Borwa le Naga ya Nigeria.

src_text: Ka Mantaha wa la 29 Motsheanong 2023, Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla hlompha memo ya ho ya Tlhomamisong ya Mokgethwa wa Bopresidente ba Rephabliki ya Bofederale ya Nigeria Monghadi Bola Ahmed Tinubu.
tgt_text: Naga ya Nigeria ke yona kgolo go di gaisa kwa ntlheng ya Bophirima jwa kontinente ya Aforika e gwebisanang le naga ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Bonkakarolo ba Mopresident bo tla bontsha tswelopele kamanong ya leano pakeng tsa Afrika Borwa le Nigeria.
tgt_text: Difeme di le ditsi tse di farologaneng tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa di beeleditse kwa nageng ya Nigeria, mme ka fa letlhakoreng le lengwe le dikgwebo tsa kwa Nigeria le tsona di setse di simolotse go itirela leina ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Nigeria le Afrika Borwa ke balekane ba kgwebo ba baholo ka ho fetisisa Afrika Bophirimela.
tgt_text: Beke ya go Keteka Tshireletso ya Bana.

src_text: Letoto le difeme tsa Afrika Borwa tse ngata di tsetetse Nigeria, ha dikhampani tsa Nigeria tsona di ntshetsa pele sebaka sa tsona Afrika Borwa.

tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa tla keteka Beke ya Tshireletso ya Bana go tloga ka la bo 28 Motsheganong 2023 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Tla re Sireletseng Bana mo Pakeng ya COVID-19 le go ya go ile”.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla tshwaya Beke ya Tshireletso ya Bana ho tloha ka la 28 Motsheanong ho isa ka la 4 Phuptjane 2023 tlasa mookotaba: “Ha re Sireletseng Bana nakong ya COVID-19 le ka Nqane ho Yona”.
tgt_text: La monongwaga letsholo le tla nna le seabe mo go RISIHA, seno ke letsholo la mo motseng la go thibela le go sekaseka maemo a sa itumediseng bana, mme maitlhomo lona ke go ntsha bana mo tlalelong go ba dira gore ba nne pelokgale.

src_text: Letsholo lena le bokella mafapha ohle le setjhaba ho leba ntlafatsong, tlhokomelong le tshireletsong ya bana.

src_text: Seboka se tla feela ka la 02 Phuptjane.

tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa tla tsaya karolo mo kopanong ya bo 56 ya lekgotlakhuduthamaga e tla tshwarelwang kwa Paris, kwa nageng ya France go tloga ka la bo 16 go fitlha ka la bo 30 Seetebosigo.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla nka karolo sebokeng sa bo-56 sa lekgotla la phethahatso se tla tshwarwa Paris, Fora ho tloha ka la 16 ho ya ka la 30 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: Khomišene ya Ditheo tsa Puso mo Mererong ya Dithuto tsa Mawatle e leng karolo ya Mokgatlho wa Thuto, Saense le Setso mo Dinagakopanong (IOC-UNESCO) ke karolo ya UN e rwelelng maikarabelo go ema nokeng merero ya lefatshe ka bophara ya saense le ditirelo mo mawatleng.

src_text: IOC ya Thuto ya UN, Mokgatlo wa Saense le Setso (IOC-UNESCO) ke mokgatlo wa UN ikarabellang bakeng sa ho tshehetsa saense ya mawatle lefatsheng ka bophara le ditshebeletso.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa tlhaloganya sentle botlhokwa jwa dipatlisiso mo tlhokomelong ya mawatle yona le mabopo yona fa go tla mo tshomarelong ya ona.

Dipatlisiso tsa mawatle gape di thusa ka go abelana ka matshwao dikotsi go sa le gale fa go tla mo matlhotlhapelong a fuduwang ke mawatle mme seno se thusa puso go tsaya dikgato tse di lolameng ka ntlha ya kitso eo.

src_text: Afrika Borwa elellwa bohlokwa ba patlisiso le tsamaiso ya mawatle le tikoloho ya mabopo lewatle bakeng sa ntshetsopele tsitsitseng.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa tla Tshwara Metshameko Megolo ya Dikgaisano tsa Bomampodi.

src_text: Patlisiso ya mawatle boetse thusa ho fana ka ditemoso tsa pele kgahlanong le dikoduwa tsa mawatleng le ho thusa mebuso ho etsa diqeto tse nang le tsebo.
Afrika Borwa Tshwara Ditlhodisano tse Kgolo tsa Dipapadi.
tgt_text: Barati ba metshameko go tswa kwa dikhutlong nne tsa lefatshe ba ka solofela go amogelwa ka diatla tsoopedi tse di mofutho tse di nang le Botho mmogo le borobasogo jwa maemo a kwa godimo fa ba tlile ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa go bona Motshameko wa Sejana sa Lefatshe sa Bolotloa mmogo le wa Dikgaisano tsa Bomampodi tsa Lefatshe wa Karathi wa Kimura Shukokai International (KSI) jaaka naga setse ipontshitse gore na le bokgoni jwa go tshwara ka katlego metshameko megolo.

src_text: Batshehetsi ba dipapadi ho tswa lefatsheng ka bophara ba ka lebella kamohelo mofuthu ya Ubuntu le kamohelo ya baeti ya boemo ba lefatshe, ha ba le papading ya Mohope wa Lefatshe wa Netebolo, Mohope wa Lefatshe wa Karate wa Kimura Shukokai International (KSI) Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Boitumelo bo tswelela go oketsega jaaka go setse matsatsinyana fela a fetang le 60 gore Motshameko wa Sejana sa Lefatshe sa Bolotloa o tla tshamekelwang kwa Motsekapa go tloga ka la bo 28 Phukwi go fitlha ka la bo 6 Phatwe.

src_text: Afrika Borwa na le nalane netefaditsweng ya ho atleha ho tshwara diketsahalo tse kgolo.
tgt_text: Leno ke lekgetlo la ntlha dikgaisano tseno di tshwarelwa mo nageng ya Aforika.

src_text: Thabo tswela pele ho kgaphatseha kaha ho setse matsatsi ka hodimonyana ho mashome tsheletseng (60) Mohope wa Lefatshe wa Netebolo qala Cape Town ho tloha ka la 28 Phupu ho isa ka la 6 Phato.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go batho botlhe go ema nokeng Letsholo la Netball Friday ka go apara diaparo tsa mebala e emang nokeng ditlhopha tse di tla tshamekang kgotsa ka go apara mebala ya setlhopha sa naga go ema nokeng Setlhopha sa Naga ya Aforika Borwa sa Metshameko ya Bolotloa.

src_text: Lena ke lekgetlo la pele tlhodisano ena tummeng tshwarelwa mobung wa Afrika.

tgt_text: KSI ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa le yona tla bo tshwaretse Dikgaisano tsa Bomampodi ba Lefatshe kwa Motsekapa go tloga ka la bo 10 go fitlha ka la bo 15 Phukwi 2023, mme re eletsa Setlhopha sa Aforika Borwa masego jaaka se ipaakanyetsa dikgaisano tseno tse di botlhokwa tsa lefatshe.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho bohle hore ba tshehetse letsholo la Netebolo la Labohlano, ka ho apara diaparo tsa batshehetsi kapa ho ikgabisa ka mebala ya naha bakeng sa ho etsa mokoloko ka mora Sehlopha sa Naha sa Netebolo sa Afrika Borwa.

tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa motlotlo go tshwarela Metshameko ya Makgaolakgang Tenese e Tshamekelwang mo Tafoleng ya Ngwaga wa 2023 kwa Durban International Convention Centre.

src_text: KSI ya Afrika Borwa boetse tla tshwara Mohope wa Bompodi ba Lefatshe ba Karate wa KSI wa bo-20 Cape Town ho tloha ka la 10 ho ya ka la 15 Phupu 2023, mme ditakaletso tse ntle di lebiswa ho Sehlopha sa Afrika Borwa ha se ntse se itokisetsa ketsahalo ena tummeng ya lefatshe ka bophara.
tgt_text: Ga jaana go na le batho ba le 600 ba ba tswang kwa dinageng ka go farologana mo lefatsheng ba ba tshamekang mo dikgaisanong tseno mme seno se naya batshameki ba naga ya rona tšhono ya go tlhagisa bokgoni jwa bona.
Metshameko eno simolotse ka la bo 20 Motsheganong mme tla garela ka la bo 28 Motsheganong

src_text: Afrika Borwa motlotlo ka ho tshwara Dipapadi tsa ho qetela tsa Bompodi ba Table Tennis tsa 2023 Setsing sa Matjhaba sa Dikopano sa Durban.
tgt_text: Melaetsa.

src_text: Hoo ka bang dibapadi tse 600 ho tswa dinaheng tse fapaneng lefatsheng ka bophara, hajwale di ntse di sebetsa mme tlhodisano ena fa dibapadi monyetla wa hore di bontshe talente ya tsona.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Tona ya Matlole, Rre Enoch Godongwana, yo neetsweng Kabo ya Tlotlo ya Batlhankedi ba Dibanka tsa Aforika ya Ngwaga wa 2023 ya go Nna Tona ya Matlole e Dirileng Tiro e Tswileng Diatla mo Ngwageng a amogetseng kwa Sharm El Sheikh, kwa nageng ya Egepeta ka Laboraro wa la bo 24 Motsheganong 2023 leng kabo e akgolang matsapa gagwe ao a dirileng mo dingwageng di le pedi tse di fetileng mo go laoleng ikonomi ya naga ya Aforika Borwa mo maemo ikonomi mo lefatsheng le ka fa nageng neng le matswakabele.

src_text: Tlhodisano qadile ka la 20 Motsheanong 2023 mme tla tswela pele ho fihlela ka la 28 Motsheanong
tgt_text: Kabo eno lebelela gape le ka fao Tona dirisitseng pholisi ya taolo ya matlole go oketsa palo ya dipeeletso mo lephateng la motlakase wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa.Hana Gammon, mokwadi wa moAforika Borwa yo nang le dingwaga di le 20 jaaka fentse Dikgaisano tsa Dinaga tsa Seoposengwe fa go tla mo Dikabong tsa go kwala Dikgang tse Dikhutshwane mo kgaolong ya Aforika mme bile ke ene yo monnye go gaisa fa sale yo kileng fenya kabo eno.

src_text: MahlohonoloKabinete lebisa mahlohonolo yona le ditakaletso tse molemo ho: Letona la Ditjhelete, Monghadi Enoch Godongwana, ya ileng fuwa kgau ya boemo bo hodimo ya African Banker 2023 ya Kgau ya Letona la Ditjhelete la Selemo ho Sharm El Sheikh, Egepeta ka Laboraro la 24 Motsheanong 2023, bakeng sa boiteko ba hae selemong se fetileng ka ho laola moruo wa Afrika Borwa nakong ya moruo le tikoloho ya lapeng tse rarahaneng.
tgt_text: The Stormers ba tla thulana le setlhopha sa The Irish Musters kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la kwa Motsekapa ka Lamatlhatso wa la bo 27 Motsheganong.

tgt_text: Rre Mda le Moporofesara Marwala maina bona okotswe mmogo le maAforika mangwe le 19 le ona ditiro tsa bona di tswileng diatla ao dirileng bontle mo maphateng a farologaneng.

tgt_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa: Moambasatara wa naga ya Aforika Borwa yo neng dira kwa nageng ya Algeria, Rre Billy Masetlha, yo diretseng naga eno mo ditirong tse di farologaneng mo pusong, go tsenyeletsa le go nna Mokaedikakaretso wa Setheo sa Ditirelo tsa Twantsho ya Bosenyi ne dira go tlala seatla mo Kgaratlhelong ya Kgololesego mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa, mme kile gape ya nna tokololo ya Umkhonto we Sizwe.Murthi Naidoo, yo dirileng ka boineelo go lwela kgololesego ya naga eno ne golega ke sepodisi sa puso ya tlhaolele ka Ngwanaitseele 1965 mme gololwa ka Moranang 1966 mme go se ditatofatso dipe tse latofadiwang ka tsona mme ne nna le seabe se segolo mo nakong eo ka fa nageng go neng go ilediwa metsamao ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: Cholera outbreak Management.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula boitahaopo jwa ga Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa jwa go leba kwa Hammanskraal go jela baagi bao nala le go buisana le bona tlhotse jetse motse oo nala gompieno, Labone wa la bo 08 Seetebosigo 2023, mme leeto leno le neile Moporesitente tšhono ya go ikutlwela ka boene selelo sa baagi ka ga dikgwetlho tse ba lebaganeng le tsona.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed President Cyril Ramaphosa’s planned visit to and interaction with residents of Hammanskraal.
tgt_text: Moporesitente, Tona ya Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe mmogo le Meyara yo Mogolo wa Tshwane ba kgonne go iponela ka matlho bona seo puso se dirang mo kgaolong eo mmogo le go neela baagi dikarabo tse di maleba..

src_text: The visit did take place today, Thursday, 08 June, 2023, and this engagement gave the President the opportunity to hear directly from residents about the challenges they face.
tgt_text: Ditharabololo tsa puso di tsenyeletsa le tsa go romela maokelo dijanaga kwa mabaleng motse wa Kanana, Hammanskraal, mmogo le go romela baitseanape ba maphata a farologaneng go thusa go thibela go anama ga bolwetse jono mme batho ba le makgolokgolo ba alafilwe ka katlego.

src_text: The President, the Minister of Water and Sanitation and the Executive Mayor of Tshwane were able to assess government interventions in the area and provide relevant feedback to residents.
tgt_text: Go samaganwe le tiro ya go dira bonnete jwa gore bakhanselara ba dikgaolo tseno ba dirisa ka tshwanelo madi go samagana le mafaratlhatlha metsi.

src_text: Government interventions include the field hospital operational in Kanana, Hammanskraal, and multi-disciplinary team of experts to arrest the spread which has successfully treated hundreds of people.
tgt_text: Mo ngwageng re leng mo go ona ono, go beilwe kwa thoko madi feta R14 bilione go thusa dimasepala go samagana le tshalelomorago e leng teng mo mafaratlhatlheng metsi..

src_text: Work is also underway to ensure that local councils use their water infrastructure grants effectively.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tirisanommogo e nnileng teng magareng ga Teropokgolo ya Tshwane le Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe mo go logeng maano go samagana le kgodiso ya Bodutelo jwa go Tlhatswa Metsi jwa Rooiwal, mme tiro eno tla diragadiwa ka dikgaolo di le tharo mme go tla tlhokagala madi le kanaka R4 bilione.

src_text: For the current financial year, over R14 billion has been set aside for municipalities to address water infrastructure backlogs.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo metseng e amegileng go itlhokomela le go tlhokomela segolobogolo bana.

src_text: Cabinet welcomes the cooperation between the City of Tshwane and Department of Water and Sanitation on the planned upgrade of the Rooiwal Water Treatment plant, which will be undertaken over three phases at cost of R4 billion..

tgt_text: Kabinete tsweletse go ikuela mo go maAforika Borwa go ema nokeng letsholo la Tlhokomelo ya Seelo sa Tiriso ya Motlakase mo Marigeng le le thankgolotsweng ke Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase, gore re kgone go boloka motlakase le go dira gore diyuniti tsa tlamelo ya motlakase di se goge boima mmogo le go dira gore mo marigeng re kgone go fokotsa ditiragalo tsa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the reintroduction of the Blue, Green and No Drop Watch which were last conducted in 2013 and 2015 respectively.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse pegelo ya Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase e bontshang dilo tse dintšhwa tseo re di fitlheletseng mo go tlhokomeleng diteišene tsa motlakase le dikarolo tse dingwe tsa tirelo eno tse, go naya motlhala, di re thusitseng gore mo matsatsing a senang go feta bokhutlho jwa beke re se dirise leokwane la disele gore re nne le motlakase.

src_text: The Green, Blue and No Drop Certification programmes are regulatory mechanisms of the Department of Water and Sanitation (DWS) as the water sector regulator in terms of both the National Water Act and Water Services Act, DWS.
tgt_text: Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase tla tshwara kopano le bobegakgang kamoso Labotlhano ka ura ya bobedi motshegare go buisana le bona ka dikgang tseno le tse dingwe tse di diragalang.

src_text: The aim of this uniquely South African regulatory tool is to improve municipal drinking water quality, wastewater management as well as water conservation and demand management.
tgt_text: Operation Vulindlela.

src_text: Cabinet deliberated on the results and implications of the 2023, Blue, Green and No Drop Watch reports, which were made public on Tuesday, 6 June.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse kgatelopele e dirilweng ka letsholo la operation Vulindlela jaaka tlhalositswe ke Tona mo Kantorong ya Moporesitente, Khumbudzo Ntshavheni, mme yona mabapi le go fetola sebopego sa maphata tlamelo ya motlakase, mafaratlhatlha go rwala dithoto, tlhaeletsano ka didirisiwa tsa thekenoloji mmogo le ditirelo tsa di-visa..

src_text: The Watch Reports indicate that there has been decline in drinking water quality and an increase in non-revenue water since the last Drop reports were issued.
tgt_text: Palo ya maphata diphetogo tseno di setseng di konoseditswe mo go ona oketsegile go tloga mo go le mararo go ya mo go le 11 mme mo go mangwe gape le 14 tiro eno ntse tsamaya sentle.

src_text: Cabinet welcomes measures to be taken by the Department of Water and Sanitation to address the current state of affairs in relation to water and waste water management.
tgt_text: Maitlhomomagolo ke go samagana le matsapa motlakase mmogo le go tokafatsa tiro ya go rwala dithoto ka diterene, mme bobedi jono ke jona jo bo imetsang kgolo ya ikonomi ya naga ya rona..

src_text: The Minister of Water and Sanitation will in the following weeks announce these measures per Province.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the recent deliberations between the Minister of Electricity, Dr Kgosientsho Ramokgopa and the Mozambican Minister for Mineral Resources and Energy, Carlos Zacarias, to secure additional power from Mozambique to support our national grid.
tgt_text: Moporesitente laetse lekgotla leno go potlakisa ditiro tsa go tokafatsa kabo ya ditirelo mmogo le go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di leng teng tse di tsamaisanang le molao, tsamaiso le tlhaelo ya dithata le badiredi.

src_text: In the immediate term, Mozambique can provide 80MW and further 1000MW over the medium term.
tgt_text: Mo kopanong eno go tšhotlhilwe gape le diphetogo tsa Molao wa Metsi le tsa Molao wa Ditirelo tsa Metsi gore melao eno kgone go tswela mosola merero ya metsi.

src_text: Cabinet continues to urge South Africans to support the Winter Demand Management campaign launched by the Minister of Electricity, to save electricity to reduce strain on the national grid and help lower load shedding stages this winter.
tgt_text: Lekgotla le ne la itsisiwe gape le ka ditharabololo tse di dirilweng ke Lefapha la Dipalangwa fa go tla mo ditirelong tsa tshoganyetso mmogo le tsa go baakanya le go tlhokomela mafaratlhatlha mmogo le tiro kgolo ya go ntsha mo diatleng tsa puso ya porofense maikarabelo go laola ditsela gore rwalwe ke ditheo tsa naga gore ditsela tsa diporofense di kgonwe go tlhokomelwa sentle ke Setheo sa Puso ya Aforika Borwa sa Kago ya Ditsela mo Nageng (Sanral).
